translations.literal: Cross mountains ford rivers, cut off Han Shang Dang attack strong Zhao, repeat Yan Yu matter, Qin must not do.
translations.idiomatic: To cross mountains and ford rivers, cut off Han's Shang Dang to attack strong Zhao - this repeats the Yan Yu matter. Qin must not do it.

sentences.zh: 若道河內，倍鄴、朝歌，絕漳滏水，與趙兵決於邯鄲之郊，是知伯之禍也，秦又不敢。

translations.literal: If take He Nei road, pass Ye, Zhao Ge, cut off Zhang Fu water, with Zhao troops decide at Han Dan suburbs, Zhi Bo calamity, Qin again not dare.
translations.idiomatic: If they take the He Nei road, pass Ye and Zhao Ge, cut off the Zhang Fu waters, and decide with Zhao troops at Han Dan's suburbs - this is Zhi Bo's calamity. Qin again would not dare.

sentences.zh: 伐楚，道涉谷，行三千里。

translations.literal: Attack Chu, road cross Gu, travel three thousand li.
translations.idiomatic: To attack Chu, the road crosses Gu and travels three thousand li.

sentences.zh: 而攻冥阸之塞，所行甚遠，所攻甚難，秦又不為也。

translations.literal: Moreover attack Ming E pass, what travel very far, what attack very difficult, Qin again not do.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, to attack the Ming E pass - what they travel is very far, what they attack is very difficult. Qin again will not do it.

sentences.zh: 若道河外，倍大梁，右（蔡左）［上蔡］、召陵，與楚兵決於陳郊，秦又不敢。

translations.literal: If take He outside road, pass Da Liang, right Shang Cai, Zhao Ling, with Chu troops decide at Chen suburbs, Qin again not dare.
translations.idiomatic: If they take the He outside road, pass Da Liang, right of Shang Cai and Zhao Ling, and decide with Chu troops at Chen's suburbs, Qin again would not dare.

sentences.zh: 故曰秦必不伐楚與趙矣，又不攻衛與齊矣。

translations.literal: Thus said Qin must not attack Chu Zhao, moreover not attack Wei Qi.
translations.idiomatic: Thus it is said Qin must not attack Chu or Zhao, moreover will not attack Wei or Qi.

sentences.zh: 夫韓亡之後，兵出之日，非魏無攻已。

translations.literal: Han perish after, troops send day, not Wei none attack self.
translations.idiomatic: After Han perishes, when troops are sent out, there will be none to attack except Wei.

sentences.zh: 秦固有懷、茅、邢丘，城垝津以臨河內，河內共、汲必危；

translations.literal: Qin already have Huai, Mao, Xing Qiu, build Gui Jin overlook He Nei, He Nei Gong, Ji must danger;
translations.idiomatic: Qin already has Huai, Mao, Xing Qiu. Building Gui Jin to overlook He Nei, He Nei's Gong and Ji will certainly be in danger.

sentences.zh: 有鄭地，得垣雍，決熒澤水灌大梁，大梁必亡。

translations.literal: Have Zheng land, get Yuan Yong, breach Ying Ze water flood Da Liang, Da Liang must perish.
translations.idiomatic: Having Zheng territory, getting Yuan Yong, breaching Ying Ze waters to flood Da Liang - Da Liang will certainly perish.

sentences.zh: 王之使者出過而惡安陵氏於秦，秦之欲誅之久矣。

translations.literal: Wang envoys pass slander An Ling clan to Qin, Qin desire execute long time.
translations.idiomatic: The wang's envoys, passing by, slandered the An Ling clan to Qin. Qin has desired to execute them for a long time.

sentences.zh: 秦葉陽、昆陽與舞陽鄰，聽使者之惡之，隨安陵氏而亡之，繞舞陽之北，以東臨許，南國必危，國無害（已）［乎］？

translations.literal: Qin Ye Yang, Kun Yang neighbor Wu Yang, listen envoy slander, follow An Ling clan perish, surround Wu Yang north, east overlook Xu, southern states must danger, state no harm?
translations.idiomatic: Qin's Ye Yang and Kun Yang neighbor Wu Yang. Listening to the envoy's slander, they follow the An Ling clan and destroy them. Surrounding Wu Yang's north, east overlooking Xu - the southern states will certainly be in danger. Will the state not be harmed?

sentences.zh: 夫憎韓不愛安陵氏可也，夫不患秦之不愛南國非也。

translations.literal: Hate Han not love An Ling clan acceptable, not worry Qin not love southern states wrong.
translations.idiomatic: To hate Han and not love the An Ling clan is acceptable. But not to worry that Qin will not love the southern states is wrong.

sentences.zh: 異日者，秦在河西晉，國去梁千里，有河山以闌之，有周韓以閒之。

translations.literal: Former days, Qin at He west Jin, state away Liang thousand li, have river mountains block, have Zhou Han separate.
translations.idiomatic: In former days, Qin was at He west Jin. The state was a thousand li from Liang, with rivers and mountains to block, Zhou and Han to separate.

sentences.zh: 從林鄉軍以至于今，秦七攻魏，五入囿中，邊城盡拔，文臺墮，垂都焚，林木伐，麋鹿盡，而國繼以圍。

translations.literal: From Lin Xiang army until now, Qin seven attack Wei, five enter preserve middle, border cities all captured, Wen Tai fallen, capital burned, forest trees cut, deer exhausted, state continue besieged.
translations.idiomatic: From the Lin Xiang army until now, Qin has attacked Wei seven times, entered the preserve five times. Border cities all captured, Wen Tai fallen, capitals burned, forest trees cut, deer exhausted, and the state continuously besieged.

sentences.zh: 又長驅梁北，東至陶衛之郊，北至平監。

translations.literal: Again long drive Liang north, east to Tao Wei suburbs, north to Ping Jian.
translations.idiomatic: Again long driving north of Liang, east to Tao Wei's suburbs, north to Ping Jian.

sentences.zh: 所亡於秦者，山南山北，河外河內，大縣數十，名都數百。

translations.literal: What lost to Qin: mountain south mountain north, river outside river inside, large counties dozens, famous cities hundreds.
translations.idiomatic: What has been lost to Qin: south and north of mountains, outside and inside the river, dozens of large counties, hundreds of famous cities.

sentences.zh: 秦乃在河西晉，去梁千里，而禍若是矣，又況於使秦無韓，有鄭地，無河山而闌之，無周韓而閒之，去大梁百里，禍必由此矣。

translations.literal: Qin at He west Jin, away Liang thousand li, calamity like this, moreover if make Qin no Han, have Zheng land, no river mountains block, no Zhou Han separate, away Da Liang hundred li, calamity must from this.
translations.idiomatic: Qin was at He west Jin, a thousand li from Liang, and the calamity was like this. Moreover, if Qin has no Han blocking, has Zheng territory, no rivers and mountains to block, no Zhou and Han to separate, only a hundred li from Da Liang - the calamity will certainly come from this.

sentences.zh: 異日者，從之不成也，楚、魏疑而韓不可得也。

translations.literal: Former days, follow not succeed, Chu, Wei doubt Han not obtainable.
translations.idiomatic: In former days, following it did not succeed. Chu and Wei doubted, and Han was unobtainable.

sentences.zh: 今韓受兵三年，秦橈之以講，識亡不聽，投質於趙，請為天下鴈行頓刃，楚、趙必集兵，皆識秦之欲無窮也，非盡亡天下之國而臣海內，必不休矣。

translations.literal: Now Han suffer troops three years, Qin bend with negotiation, know perish not listen, send hostage to Zhao, request be world wild goose formation stop blade, Chu, Zhao must gather troops, all know Qin desire infinite, not exhaust world states make minister all within seas, must not stop.
translations.idiomatic: Now Han has suffered troops for three years. Qin bends them with negotiation. They know they will perish but do not listen. They send hostages to Zhao, requesting to be the world's wild goose formation to stop the blade. Chu and Zhao will certainly gather troops. All know Qin's desires are infinite. Unless they exhaust all the world's states and make ministers of all within the seas, they will not stop.

sentences.zh: 是故臣願以從事王，王速受楚趙之約，（趙）［而］挾韓之質以存韓，而求故地，韓必效之。

translations.literal: Thus minister wish serve wang, wang quickly accept Chu Zhao alliance, hold Han hostage save Han, seek former land, Han must submit.
translations.idiomatic: Thus this minister wishes to serve the wang. The wang should quickly accept the Chu and Zhao alliance, hold Han's hostages to save Han, and seek former territory. Han will certainly submit it.

sentences.zh: 此士民不勞而故地得，其功多於與秦共伐韓，而又與彊秦鄰之禍也。

translations.literal: This officers people not toil former land obtained, merit more than with Qin together attack Han, moreover avoid strong Qin neighbor calamity.
translations.idiomatic: This way officers and people do not toil yet obtain former territory. Its merit is greater than attacking Han together with Qin, and moreover avoids the calamity of neighboring strong Qin.

sentences.zh: 夫存韓安魏而利天下，此亦王之天時已。

translations.literal: Save Han secure Wei benefit world, this wang heavenly timing.
translations.idiomatic: To save Han, secure Wei, and benefit the world - this is also the wang's heavenly timing.

sentences.zh: 通韓上黨於共、甯，使道安成，出入賦之，是魏重質韓以其上黨也。

translations.literal: Connect Han Shang Dang to Gong, Ning, make road An Cheng, enter exit tax, Wei heavy hostage Han with Shang Dang.
translations.idiomatic: Connect Han's Shang Dang to Gong and Ning. Make the road through An Cheng. Tax its comings and goings. This is Wei holding Han hostage with its Shang Dang.

sentences.zh: 今有其賦，足以富國。

translations.literal: Now have taxes, sufficient enrich state.
translations.idiomatic: Now having its taxes, it is sufficient to enrich the state.

sentences.zh: 韓必德魏愛魏重魏畏魏，韓必不敢反魏，是韓則魏之縣也。

translations.literal: Han must virtue Wei love Wei respect Wei fear Wei, Han must not dare oppose Wei, Han then Wei county.
translations.idiomatic: Han will certainly virtue Wei, love Wei, respect Wei, fear Wei. Han will certainly not dare oppose Wei. Thus Han becomes Wei's county.

sentences.zh: 魏得韓以為縣，衛、大梁、河外必安矣。

translations.literal: Wei get Han as county, Wei, Da Liang, He outside must secure.
translations.idiomatic: Wei gets Han as a county. Wei, Da Liang, and lands outside the He will certainly be secure.

sentences.zh: 今不存韓，二周、安陵必危，楚、趙大破，衛、齊甚畏，天下西鄉而馳秦入朝而為臣不久矣。

translations.literal: Now not save Han, two Zhou, An Ling must danger, Chu, Zhao greatly broken, Wei, Qi very fear, world west face run Qin enter court minister not long.
translations.idiomatic: Now if Han is not saved, the two Zhou and An Ling will certainly be in danger. Chu and Zhao will be greatly broken. Wei and Qi will be very fearful. The world will face west and run to Qin, entering court to become ministers before long.

sentences.zh: 二十年，秦圍邯鄲，信陵君無忌矯奪將軍晉鄙兵以救趙，趙得全。

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Qin besiege Han Dan, Xin Ling Jun Wu Ji forge seize general Jin Bi troops save Zhao, Zhao get whole.
translations.idiomatic: In the twentieth year, Qin besieged Han Dan. Xin Ling Jun Wu Ji forged orders and seized General Jin Bi's troops to save Zhao. Zhao was preserved whole.

sentences.zh: 無忌因留趙。

translations.literal: Wu Ji thus stay Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Ji thus stayed in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 二十六年，秦昭王卒。

translations.literal: Twenty-sixth year, Qin Zhao Wang died.
translations.idiomatic: In the twenty-sixth year, Qin Zhao Wang died.

sentences.zh: 三十年，無忌歸魏，率五國兵攻秦，敗之河外，走蒙驁。

translations.literal: Thirtieth year, Wu Ji return Wei, lead five states troops attack Qin, defeat river outside, flee Meng Ao.
translations.idiomatic: In the thirtieth year, Wu Ji returned to Wei. Leading five states' troops, he attacked Qin, defeated them outside the river, and put Meng Ao to flight.

sentences.zh: 魏太子增質於秦，秦怒，欲囚魏太子增。

translations.literal: Wei crown prince Zeng hostage Qin, Qin angry, desire imprison Wei crown prince Zeng.
translations.idiomatic: Wei crown prince Zeng was a hostage in Qin. Qin was angry and desired to imprison Wei crown prince Zeng.

sentences.zh: 或為增謂秦王曰：「公孫喜固謂魏相曰『請以魏疾擊秦，秦王怒，必囚增。

translations.literal: Someone for Zeng told Qin wang said: 'Gong Sun Xi already told Wei chancellor 'request with Wei suddenly attack Qin, Qin wang angry, must imprison Zeng.
translations.idiomatic: Someone, for Zeng, told the Qin wang: 'Gong Sun Xi already told the Wei chancellor: "Request to suddenly attack Qin with Wei. The Qin wang will be angry and must imprison Zeng."'

sentences.zh: 魏王又怒，擊秦，秦必傷』。

translations.literal: Wei wang again angry, attack Qin, Qin must hurt.'
translations.idiomatic: The Wei wang will again be angry, attack Qin, and Qin will certainly be hurt.'

sentences.zh: 今王囚增，是喜之計中也。

translations.literal: Now wang imprison Zeng, Xi plan hit.
translations.idiomatic: Now if the wang imprisons Zeng, it will hit Xi's plan.

sentences.zh: 故不若貴增而合魏，以疑之於齊、韓。」

translations.literal: Thus not as honor Zeng unite Wei, use doubt Qi, Han.'
translations.idiomatic: Thus it is better to honor Zeng and unite with Wei, using it to sow doubt in Qi and Han.'

sentences.zh: 秦乃止增。

translations.literal: Qin thus stopped Zeng.
translations.idiomatic: Qin thus stopped with Zeng.

sentences.zh: 三十一年，秦王政初立。

translations.literal: Thirty-first year, Qin wang Zheng first established.
translations.idiomatic: In the thirty-first year, Qin wang Zheng was first established.

sentences.zh: 三十四年，安釐王卒，太子增立，是為景湣王。

translations.literal: Thirty-fourth year, An Xi Wang died, crown prince Zeng established, called Jing Min Wang.
translations.idiomatic: In the thirty-fourth year, An Xi Wang died. Crown prince Zeng was established, called Jing Min Wang.

sentences.zh: 信陵君無忌卒。

translations.literal: Xin Ling Jun Wu Ji died.
translations.idiomatic: Xin Ling Jun Wu Ji died.

sentences.zh: 景湣王元年，秦拔我二十城，以為秦東郡。

translations.literal: Jing Min Wang first year, Qin captured our twenty cities, made Qin eastern commandery.
translations.idiomatic: In Jing Min Wang's first year, Qin captured our twenty cities and made them Qin's eastern commandery.

sentences.zh: 二年，秦拔我朝歌。

translations.literal: Second year, Qin captured our Zhao Ge.
translations.idiomatic: In the second year, Qin captured our Zhao Ge.

sentences.zh: 衛徙野王。

translations.literal: Wei moved Ye Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Wei moved to Ye Wang.

sentences.zh: 三年，秦拔我汲。

translations.literal: Third year, Qin captured our Ji.
translations.idiomatic: In the third year, Qin captured our Ji.

sentences.zh: 五年，秦拔我垣、蒲陽、衍。

translations.literal: Fifth year, Qin captured our Yuan, Pu Yang, Yan.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifth year, Qin captured our Yuan, Pu Yang, and Yan.

sentences.zh: 十五年，景湣王卒，子王假立。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Jing Min Wang died, son Wang Jia established.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifteenth year, Jing Min Wang died. His son Wang Jia was established.

sentences.zh: 王假元年，燕太子丹使荊軻刺秦王，秦王覺之。

translations.literal: Wang Jia first year, Yan crown prince Dan sent Jing Ke assassinate Qin wang, Qin wang aware.
translations.idiomatic: In Wang Jia's first year, Yan crown prince Dan sent Jing Ke to assassinate the Qin wang. The Qin wang became aware.

sentences.zh: 三年，秦灌大梁，虜王假，遂滅魏以為郡縣。

translations.literal: Third year, Qin flooded Da Liang, captured Wang Jia, thus extinguished Wei made commanderies counties.
translations.idiomatic: In the third year, Qin flooded Da Liang, captured Wang Jia, and thus extinguished Wei to make it commanderies and counties.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吾適故大梁之墟，墟中人曰：「秦之破梁，引河溝而灌大梁，三月城壞，王請降，遂滅魏。」

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: I visited former Da Liang ruins, ruins people said: 'Qin break Liang, led river ditch flood Da Liang, three months city ruined, wang request surrender, thus extinguished Wei.'
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: I visited the ruins of the former Da Liang. The people in the ruins said: 'When Qin broke Liang, they led river ditches to flood Da Liang. In three months the city was ruined. The wang requested surrender, and thus Wei was extinguished.'

sentences.zh: 說者皆曰魏以不用信陵君故，國削弱至於亡，余以為不然。

translations.literal: Speakers all said Wei because not use Xin Ling Jun reason, state cut weak to extinction, I think not so.
translations.idiomatic: All speakers say Wei, because of not using Xin Ling Jun, had its state cut and weakened to extinction. I think not so.

sentences.zh: 天方令秦平海內，其業未成，魏雖得阿衡之佐，曷益乎？

translations.literal: Heaven just command Qin pacify all within seas, enterprise not complete, Wei though get A Heng assistant, what benefit?
translations.idiomatic: Heaven was just commanding Qin to pacify all within the seas. Its enterprise was not complete. Even if Wei got an assistant like A Heng, what benefit would it have?
